answers.answer: It is an indication of a cranial nerve palsy, which generally resolves by itself in a few weeks. Usually this is due to diabetes (get an hba1c) , but every once in a while you have infection, reaction to medication,  tumor, or an aneurysm, so it is a good idea to get an in-person evaluation by a neurologist.

question: I noticed that while I am talking my lower lip goes one side, is it symptoms of paralysis or what.And please suggest me what should I do....
title: symptoms of paralysis with lower lip goes to one side..
